description.value:
User can make teleport up to 4d10 Metres as a movement action. Always emerging on solid ground in empty space if possible. If three of the 4 die have the same number, user does not emerge for 1d5 rounds and gains 1 Corruption. If all 4 dice have the same number, user also gains 1d5 insanity.

Requirements

A Rare Archeotech Item, They are Good Craftsmanship by default, with no Poor or Common Craftsmanship versions. (if there are, they're probably fake)

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
